Donate

If you would like to donate to DEFNA, we accept donations which we typically put towards our diversity and financial aid programs. For a current event there will be an option to buy a diversity ticket or make a donation. Alternatively, at any time you can make a donation via

  • Square Cash, for US credit/debit cards by visiting: https://cash.me/$defna.
  • PayPal, for worldwide credit/debit cards by visiting here.

If you use Amazon.com we are part of the Amazon Smile program, click to sign up. 0.5% of your eligable purchases will be donated to DEFNA, at no cost to you.

Thank you in advance for your donation!
